mapper.select: select g.id, g.subscribe_id, g.group_account, g.leader_user, g.is_active, g.group_name, g.billing_date, g.invitation_code from `group` g where id = #{id}
select g.id, g.subscribe_id, g.group_account, g.leader_user, g.is_active, g.group_name, g.billing_date, g.invitation_code from `group` g
